entities.name: York College
entities.span: Among the many billets which I have filled in America during my wandering life, I was once janitor and sweeper out of the laboratory at York College.

entities.name: Police Station
entities.span: “I guess you’re going to take me to the police-station,” he remarked to Sherlock Holmes.

entities.name: Marriage Ring
entities.span: I took the marriage ring from her dead finger, and I vowed that his dying eyes should rest upon that very ring, and that his last thoughts should be of the crime for which he was punished.
